full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MCHOG ROL PA GSANG SGRUB LA BRTEN PA'I GTOR BZLOG GI CHOG BSGRIG BDUD LAS RGYAL BA'I RNGA SGRA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @025A *, ,(CES YI DAM RTA MCHOG ROL PA GSANG SGRUB LA BRTEN PA'I GTOR BZLOG GI CHOG BSGRIGS BDUD LAS RGYAL BA'I RNGA SGRA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SUDH'A DHVADZA SIDHAS KUN MKHYEN LNGA PA CHEN PO DANG GNAS BRTAN 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA, SKYABS MGON BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO SOGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS DANG YIG RNYING RNAMS BYIN RLABS CHE CHED RANG SOR BZHAG ,GZHAN KHA 'GENGS 'OS PA RNAMS PADMA YANG GSANG SOGS RIGS MTHUN GYI YIG CHA RNAMS NAS KHA BSKANGS, TSIG ZUR BSGYUR DGOS RNAMS GSAR DU BCOS TE NAG PO 'GRO SHES SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS 'DI'I LUGS LA BLO MIG YANGS PA'I MDZOD PA CHOS RJE'I TS PO RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BGYIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
